ygData.subject: info request
ygData.msgSnippet: At some point I swear I will post something on topic, but um, until then, *weasely smile* is there an Enchanters mailing list or message board that is the
ygData.messageBody:
At some point I swear I will post something on topic, but um, until then,
*weasely smile* is there an Enchanters mailing list or message board that is
the "good one" like this list is the "good one" for Bards? Lot's of places
to hear people talking *cough*complaining*cough* but places with a high
signal to noise ratio like this list are rare. Any pointers?

Tszaaz

P.S. (ooh and on topic, er, kinda) I played Tszaaz (Bard 25) last night for
the first time in a looong time, wow it is easy to get very rusty at song
weaving. At any rate I was Erudes crossing on a mission to collect Kerra
Beetle eyes for a friend. It can be tough when people outnumber wisps but
overall it gets my vote as the nicest zone in the game for pleasant
comradery. It's like the Anti-HighPass-Orc-Side. And as was by far the
highest level person there (and causing trouble by killing beetles
occasionally causing Fire Elems and Madman to spawn) it was nice to be able
to respond to some overwhelmed youngster by just running up and singing
until sanity was restored.
